story.text: It has been a few years since cracking the code for d3 technique. It is coming back slowly. First, be sure anything you read online is for v5 which we have chosen to use. Then use each example as a guide through the docs before trying any part in code you want to work.

item.text: It has been a few years since cracking the code for d3 technique. It is coming back slowly. First, be sure anything you read online is for v5 which we have chosen to use. Then use each example as a guide through the docs before trying any part in code you want to work.
Updating a selection without rebinding data. [https://stackoverflow.com/questions/39590283/d3-using-a-closure-to-update-a-selection-without-re-binding-data stackoverflow]
